allow: Bash(cmd /c ".venv\\Scripts\\python.exe -c ""from data.kalshi import KalshiClient; from config import KALSHI_API_KEY, KALSHI_API_KEY_ID, TRADING_MODE; k = KalshiClient\(api_key=KALSHI_API_KEY, key_id=KALSHI_API_KEY_ID, paper=\(TRADING_MODE==''paper''\)\); m = k.get_market\(''KXHIGHTPHX-26FEB21-T70''\); print\(''floor_strike:'', m.get\(''floor_strike''\) if m else ''NO MKT''\); print\(''ceil_strike:'', m.get\(''ceil_strike''\) if m else ''''\); print\(''strike_type:'', m.get\(''strike_type''\) if m else ''''\); print\(''yes_sub_title:'', m.get\(''yes_sub_title''\) if m else ''''\); tl,th,ol,oh=k._parse_bounds_from_market\(m\); print\(''parsed tl=%s th=%s ol=%s oh=%s''%\(tl,th,ol,oh\)\)""")
